column6: AVENGERS DISASSEMBLED TIE-IN! "RAGNAROK" PART 3 (OF 6) Beset on all sides by treacherous foes from his past, the God of Thunder leads the tattered remnants of the forces of Asgard on a desperate quest, as the Realm Eternal burns...
column8: | penciller (cover):Steve Epting | writer:Mike Avon Oeming | colorist:Laura Villari | penciller:Andrea Di Vito
